newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Products rated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Products rated.

text.p: -- Interstate/Johnson Lane analyst Dimitri Triantafyllides said in a research note that he initiated coverage of Computer Products Inc with a neutral recommendation.

-- "While the company has ... demonstrated an impressive track record of revenue growth and expanding profitability by increasingly emphasizing high-growth markets while decreasing the time to market new product designs, we believe much of this solid performance in reflected in the current stock price," the analyst said.
-- 1996 earnings estimate is $0.78 per share and for 1997 it is $1.02 per share.
